binding:binding.name: Visonic PowerMax Binding
binding:binding.description: The Visonic PowerMax binding interfaces with Visonic PowerMax and PowerMaster alarm panel series.
binding:binding.author: Laurent Garnier

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial port
parameter.description: The serial port to use for connecting to the serial interface of the PowerMax alarm system e.g. COM1 for Windows and /dev/ttyS0 or /dev/ttyUSB0 for Linux.

parameter.name: ip
parameter.label: IP address
parameter.description: The IP address to use for connecting to the Ethernet interface of the PowerMax alarm system.

parameter.name: tcpPort
parameter.label: TCP port
parameter.description: The TCP port to use for connecting to the Ethernet interface of the PowerMax alarm system.

parameter.name: motionOffDelay
parameter.label: Motion reset delay
parameter.description: The delay in minutes to reset a motion detection.

parameter.name: allowArming
parameter.label: Allow arming
parameter.description: Enable or disable arming the PowerMax alarm system from openHAB.

parameter.name: allowDisarming
parameter.label: Allow disarming
parameter.description: Enable or disable disarming the PowerMax alarm system from openHAB.

parameter.name: pinCode
parameter.label: PIN code
parameter.description: The PIN code to use for arming/disarming the PowerMax alarm system from openHAB. Not required except when Powerlink mode cannot be used.

parameter.name: forceStandardMode
parameter.label: Force standard mode
parameter.description: Force the standard mode rather than trying using the Powerlink mode.

parameter.name: panelType
parameter.label: Panel type
parameter.description: Define the panel type. Only required when forcing the standard mode.

parameter.name: autoSyncTime
parameter.label: Sync time
parameter.description: Automatic sync time at openHAB startup.
